lead_paragraph: LEAD: A brief article by The Associated Press on Aug. 18 about the denial of parole for Elmer (Geronimo) Pratt, a former Black Panther Party leader, referred incorrectly to his use of heroin. In a California parole hearing, remarks about his drug use dealt with the period before, not after, he was imprisoned for the murder of a woman in 1968.
